description:
Watch a massive collection of English-dubbed anime and hundreds of subtitled shows from Japan on Funimation. Stream our library of ad-free anime in HD on your Nintendo Switch. A library full of movies, OVAs, extras, and best of all: the hottest, top-trending shows like My Hero Academia, Fruits Basket, Black Clover, Attack on Titan, and more! 

Start your free trial and begin your anime adventure today. 

Funimation subscription benefits include:

Ad-Free
Nobody interrupts your anime. Nobody. 

Simultaneous Streams
Get up to five simultaneous streams on one account.
name: Funimation
